<letter id='bsl839'>
<recipient first='' last='' type='individual'/>
<a href='/results.php?city=Los Angeles' rel='city origin'>Ciudad de Los Angeles</a><br/>  
Feby <a rel='day origin' value='7'>7</a>, <a href="/results.php?year=1847">1847</a><br/>  
E.H. Williams, Esq.,
</p><p>
This will serve to introduce you to adjutant, L.T. Talbot, Bearer of Dispatches from <a href="/results.php?tla=jhf" rel="colleague met">Gov. Fremont</a> to U.S. Govnt. Any Attention paid Mr. Talbot will be duly appreciated by your affectionate Bub.
</p><p>
<a href="/results.php?tla=bsl" rel="me">Benj. S. Lippincott</a>
</p>
</letter>
